name: HChapa 2 plus - The free typing game game
name_original: HChapa 2 plus - The free typing game game
description:
HChapa is an educational game to increase typing speed. After each game play you will see percentage of your gameplay achievement.

Score are awarded as  follow:

If you type matching key you get +1

If you type wrong key you get -1

If you ignored key you get 0.

Our principle: It is better to ignore key than to type wrong key, but your points will be in standstill! :-) :-P

This the major update since release of hChapa v1.00 which was written  in Java, it was stylised as hChapa. We found that many people were interested in hChapa v1.00 game however it was never be updated for long time so we now release v2.00+ with more improvements like:

- Resizability: With enhanced resizing techniques

- Custom keys: Able to play specific chosen keys.

- Native runtime support: Unlike v1.00 which is Java based, this is the

platform specific, we hope to port to other OS whenever possible.

- Permanent settings/options: Settings will be saved permanently until

user changes them.

- Gameplay indicator - This helps to know whether you are in the middle of

the gameplay or near the end.

The way to operate is almost the same as v1.00...

To start game click top right spherical button.

Click gear icon to access settings/options.

You can force to terminate current gameplay via menu,

File/New.

App languages supported: English, Swahili.
